universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Interface StatefulAdapter


  • public interface StatefulAdapter
    Interface for adapters which specifies API to support saving and restoring of the adapter's current state.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void restoreInstanceState(Parcelable savedState)
      Called to restore a previous state, saved by saveInstanceState(), of this adapter.
      Parcelable saveInstanceState()
      Called to save the current state of this adapter.

    • Method Detail

      • saveInstanceState

        @NonNull
Parcelable saveInstanceState()
        Called to save the current state of this adapter.
        Returns:
        Saved state of this adapter or an empty state if this adapter does not need to save its state.

      • restoreInstanceState

        void restoreInstanceState(@NonNull
                          Parcelable savedState)
        Called to restore a previous state, saved by saveInstanceState(), of this adapter.
        Parameters:
        savedState - Should be the same state as obtained via saveInstanceState() before.
